title: Thorgal package 1
description:
Thorgal package 1


New scans of the Thorgal books.  

In this package:

Thorgal 01 - Vol 1 - Child of Stars
Thorgal 01 - Vol 2 - Aaricia
Thorgal 02 - Vol 1 - The Three Elders of Aran
Thorgal 02 - Vol 2 - The Black Galley
Thorgal 03 - Vol 1 - Beyond the Shadows
Thorgal 03 - Vol 2 - The Fall of Brek Zarith
Thorgal 06 - Vol 1 - City of the Lost God
Thorgal 06 - Vol 2 - Between Earth and Sun

The old releases on TPB had dark bandings, areas out of focus and text missing.


Thorgal 12 - The Brand of Exiles
Thorgal 13 - Ogotai's Crown
Thorgal 14 - Giants

My own scans. They have been cleaned up a bit since last release.

Thorgal 15 - The Cage      

Completely new album translated to english.

I hope you enjoy and please buy the hard copies to support future releases from 
Cinebook. I will release the rest of the books at a later time.
